metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0971 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Blink Layout in Google Chrome on Android prior to99.0.4844.74 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
